Subjects: Thecla, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Thecla, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[Q]wene paule prechit godis vordþat befor al it had in
                    hurde…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…to god fra hyne þat I ma twynbut det schame & dedly
                    syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 2.193-97.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 2.2.432-44.
